# File test/ext_arr_test.rb, line 393
  def ea_bm_test(mode, length=20, array=nil, &block)
    benchmark_test(length) do |x|
      unless array
        array = []
        1.upto(10000) {|i| array << i.to_s }
      end
       
      begin
        ea = ExtArr[*array]
        yield(x, "", ea)
      ensure
        ea.close if index
      end

      yield(x, "array reference", array)
    end
     
    array
  end
